Effect

Class VictoryPointBonus

  • java.lang.Object
    • Effect.Effect
      • Effect.VictoryPointBonus

  • public class VictoryPointBonus
extends Effect
    Object representation of any card or stage effect which grants a victory point bonus to the player.
